abstract.para: This section provides a reference &grub; configuration used to initiate the &agama; installer over PXE boot using kernel and initrd images delivered via HTTP.

section.title: &grub; configuration for HTTP-based boot
section.para: The following is a minimal example of grub.cfg used for UEFI PXE clients. Adjust paths and architecture-specific entries according to your environment.

example.title: Minimal &grub; configuration for HTTPBoot

callout.para: Sets the default menu entry to the first (0-based index).
Specifies a timeout of 5 seconds before the default entry is automatically booted.
Loads the kernel over HTTP and specifies the install source URL for the &agama; installer.
Loads the corresponding initrd image from the HTTP server.
